values: 笔记；记录；便签；便条；批注；注释；注解；正式文件；短笺；纸币；钞票；单音；（外交文书）照会；（图书资料、录音或唱片等）封套介绍
记录；做笔记；注意；提到；提醒；观察；留意；标明；表明；提及；指出；记下；记住；着重提到；强调；发表意见；记载；注解

synonym.mean: 笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子

sample.mean: v. 意味着；有…的含意；暗示；意味着…的结果
v. 表示；指示；作为…名称
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
n. 概念；观念；看法；见解；一时的念头；突发的奇想；小件物品；感知
n. 恶名；声名狼藉；丑名；臭名昭著
adj. 声名狼藉的；臭名昭著的；众所周知的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 集合名词，指全部来往信件。
最普通用词，泛指一切形式的书信，尤指邮寄的信。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条，正式或非正式均可。
一般用词，侧重专心于某事。
一般指经过思维活动而注意到。
指用心地去观察，了解某人或某物以达到某一目的。常用于命令句中。
指对所见所闻所感的人或事作出的反应，侧重结果。
语气比notice强，指不仅注意到，而且记录下来，侧重注意的认真与仔细。

word_group.brief_definition: 重要的, 引人注目的

bilingual.source: "Thinking is a more important ability than note-taking and memorising," he said.
bilingual.target: “思考比记笔记和背诵更重要，”他说。

bilingual.source: The teacher found I was struggling with note-taking and told me to stop and just listen.
bilingual.target: 老师发现我记笔记很吃力，叫我停下来听讲。

bilingual.source: He always carries a notebook to note down his ideas.
bilingual.target: 他总是随身带着笔记本，以便记下灵感。

bilingual.source: She left a note on the fridge reminding him to buy milk.
bilingual.target: 她在冰箱上留了一张笔记，提醒他买牛奶。

bilingual.source: He found an old note from his school days in his drawer.
bilingual.target: 他在抽屉里发现了一张他上学时的旧笔记。

bilingual.source: The teacher asked the students to review their note before the exam.
bilingual.target: 老师要求学生在考试前复习他们的笔记。

bilingual.source: She wrote a quick note to thank her friend for the gift.
bilingual.target: 她写了一张简短的笔记，感谢她的朋友送的礼物。

bilingual.source: He took a course in shorthand to improve his note-taking abilities.
bilingual.target: 他参加了速记课程，以提高他的笔记能力。

bilingual.source: I always take a note during meetings to remember important points.
bilingual.target: 我总是在会议期间做笔记，以记住重要的要点。

bilingual.source: Yesterday, when I reached home, I found that my note book was missing.
bilingual.target: 昨天，当我到家时，我发现我的笔记本不见了。

list.abstract: note英 [nəut] 美 [not] n.注意，笔记，注解，便条vt.注意，记录，。对…加注释，指出[例句]Somehow he tells these stories without a note of horror.不知为什么他讲这些故事时一点都不害怕。

yingyinNormal.en: They come with clean note books and their pencils are sharpened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们准备好了崭新的笔记本，削尖了铅笔。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank God you finally said that. I saw you make a note on your pad three hours ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢上帝，你终于说了。三个小时前我就看到你写在笔记本上了。

yingyinNormal.en: What about the note? We'll worry about the note later.
yingyinNormal.zh: 纸条怎么回事？纸条的事以后再说。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I left a note and everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还留了一张纸条在上面。

yingyinNormal.en: I told you, "look inside." In the note.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我告诉过你，纸条上有说往里面看。

yingyinNormal.en: Do what? This phone call, it's my note.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做什么? 这通电话是我的留言。

yingyinNormal.en: Note to self: Never stow away in a gym sock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提醒自己：永远别藏在运动袜里。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like to add something on a personal note.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想分享点个人感受。

yingyinNormal.en: It's what people do, don't they? Leave a note.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们不是都这么做吗? 留下留言。

yingyinNormal.en: You heard your note nearly proved fatal to poor Denker?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道你的信差点要了可怜的丹可的老命啊？

yingyinNormal.en: This doesn't have another insulting note in it, does it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里不会又是一张侮辱性的纸条吧？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Leave a note when?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么留言?

yingyinNormal.en: Culverton gave me Faith's original note. A mutual friend put us in touch. Did Sherlock ever tell you about the note?
yingyinNormal.zh: 卡尔福顿把费斯原本的字条给了我一个共同的朋友。介绍我们认识。夏洛克跟你提过那张字条吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And on that note, how about we say good night to your father?
yingyinNormal.zh: 说到这里，不如我们跟爸爸说晚安吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Beds empty. No note. Car gone. You could've died. You could've been seen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 床上没人，没有留下任何纸条，偷开车子。你们有可能会死掉，你们有可能被别人看到。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, yes. I have a note here from Mr. Mahmud. That meeting is no longer as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，这有穆罕默德先生给您的留言，会议也取消了。

yingyinNormal.en: And this has nothing to do with the fact that he needs a note to get out of gym.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这跟他需要假条才能离开体育课无关？

yingyinNormal.en: Good. That's good. Show you me how you're gonna pull the note out of your pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，这样很好，跟我...跟我演一遍你该怎么把纸条从口袋拿出来。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, there's a note in here. Oh, it's probably from Rico. He's obsessed with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瞧，衣服里夹了张纸条。肯定是里科写的，他对我非常着迷。

yingyinNormal.en: Show me the note. Come on. When you're at the hospital. Show me. What's this? What's that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我看纸条，快点，就当你现在在医院，给我演一遍。这是什么？什么东西？

exam_freq_info.chinese: (of note)著名的; 引人注目的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 著名的；有名的
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
adj. 值得注意的；显著的

word_family.mean: n. 记录；笔记；便条；钞票；音；口气；口吻；气氛；音符；注释

sense_info_list.en: remark upon (something), typically in order to draw one's attention to it

examination_example.sentence: In fact women even say they feel better at work, she <highlight>notes</highlight>, "It is men, not women, who report being happier at home than at work."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，女性甚至说她们在工作中感觉更好，她指出：“是男性，而非女性，称其在家比在工作中更快乐。”

examination_example.sentence: But he <highlight>noted</highlight> that biomedical journals pay strong attention to statistical review.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他指出，生物医学期刊非常重视统计审查。

examination_example.sentence: But as Cline is the first to <highlight>note</highlight>, it took Beaumont decades to perfect her craft; her example can't be knocked off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但正如Cline第一个指出的那样，Beaumont花了几十年的时间来完善她的手艺；她的榜样是不可复制的。

sense_info_list.en: a brief record of facts, topics, or thoughts, written down as an aid to memory

examination_example.sentence: I found that he had left an extensive journal and copious <highlight>notes</highlight> about his work in the Peninsula.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现他留下了一本关于他在半岛工作的厚实的日记和一些详尽的笔记。

examination_example.sentence: On the assumption that they will become relevant later, you make a mental <highlight>note</highlight> of discourse entities as well as possible links between them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设它们稍后会变得相关，你在心里记下语篇实体以及它们之间可能有的联系。

sense_info_list.en: notice or pay particular attention to something

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>noting</highlight> that the Victorians suddenly seem to become more human.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们注意到，维多利亚时代的人似乎突然变得更加有人情味。

sense_info_list.zh: (of note)著名的; 引人注目的

examination_example.sentence: We must remember further that hosts of plays have been lost, and that probably there is no author of <highlight>note</highlight> whose entire work has survived.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还必须记住，许多剧本已经丢失，而且可能没有一位著名作家的全部作品得以幸存。

sense_info_list.en: a short comment on or explanation of a word or passage in a book or article; an annotation
a short informal letter or written message
a single tone of definite pitch made by a musical instrument or the human voice; a written sign representing the pitch and duration of a musical note
a promise to pay a specified amount on demand or at a certain time
a particular quality or tone that reflects or expresses a mood or attitude
a piece of paper money, especially one issued by a central bank

sample.mean: v. 意味着；有…的含意；暗示；意味着…的结果
v. 表示；指示；作为…名称
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
n. 概念；观念；看法；见解；一时的念头；突发的奇想；小件物品；感知
n. 恶名；声名狼藉；丑名；臭名昭著
adj. 声名狼藉的；臭名昭著的；众所周知的

word_usage.usage: “记笔记”可用make/take a note或take notes表达，而take note (of)则表示“注意; 留心”。

note多用作及物动词，可接that/wh-从句作宾语，表示“提到; 注意到”。
示例：Please note that there are a limited number of tickets.
请注意，票的数量有限。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (尤指为引起注意而)发表意见; 指出

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 著名的；有名的
adj. 令人关注的；值得注意的；重要的；不寻常的
adj. 值得注意的；显著的
n. 笔记本；笔记本电脑
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
n. 通知；通告；告示
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报

word_family.mean: n. 记录；笔记；便条；钞票；音；口气；口吻；气氛；音符；注释

sense_info_list.en: remark upon (something), typically in order to draw one's attention to it
sense_info_list.zh: (尤指为引起注意而)发表意见; 指出

examination_example.sentence: As he <highlight>noted</highlight> in his recent paper, "the idea of positive cognitive and neural side effects from music training is inherently appealing."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在最近的论文中指出，音乐训练对认知和神经系统产生积极副作用的想法本身就很吸引人。

examination_example.sentence: In an image-centered and pleasure-driven world, Postman <highlight>noted</highlight>, there is no place for rational thinking, because you simply cannot think with images.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Postman指出，在一个以图像为中心、以快乐为驱动的世界里，没有理性思考的空间，因为你根本无法用图像思考。

examination_example.sentence: French political commentators <highlight>noted</highlight> the devastating fire had succeeded where Macron had failed in uniting the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国政治评论员指出，马克龙尚未能使国家团结起来，而这场毁灭性的大火却做到了。

sense_info_list.en: notice or pay particular attention to something

examination_example.sentence: It is also important to <highlight>note</highlight> that the study found only a correlation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得注意的是，这项研究只发现了一个相关性。

examination_example.sentence: Yes, I need to <highlight>note</highlight> when I'm worrying about inconsequential things, I guess.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是的，我想，当我担心无关紧要的事情时，我需要注意。

examination_example.sentence: It's important to <highlight>note</highlight> that robotic nurses don't decide courses of treatment or make diagnoses (though robot doctors and surgeons may not be far off).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要注意的是，机器人护士并不能决定治疗方案或做出诊断（虽然机器人医生和外科医生可能离我们不远了）。

sense_info_list.en: a brief record of facts, topics, or thoughts, written down as an aid to memory
a short informal letter or written message
a short comment on or explanation of a word or passage in a book or article; an annotation
a piece of paper money, especially one issued by a central bank

sample.mean: v. 意味着；有…的含意；暗示；意味着…的结果
v. 表示；指示；作为…名称
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
n. 概念；观念；看法；见解；一时的念头；突发的奇想；小件物品；感知
n. 恶名；声名狼藉；丑名；臭名昭著
adj. 声名狼藉的；臭名昭著的；众所周知的

word_usage.usage:
note作“笔记”时，其后须加s；作“书信”时,其后不加s。
示例：他做了听课笔记。
误 He made/took (a) note of the lecture.
正 He made/took notes of the lecture.
take notes of表示“记录”，而take note of表示“注意”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 集合名词, 指全部来往信件。
最普通用词, 泛指一切形式的书信, 尤指邮寄的信。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条, 正式或非正式均可。
指用心地去观察, 了解某人或某物以达到某一目的。常用于命令句中。
语气比 notice 强, 指不仅注意到, 而且记录下来, 侧重注意的认真与仔细。
指对所见所闻所感的人或事作出的反应, 侧重结果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 钞票；纸币
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
adj. 值得注意的；显著的
n. 笔记本；笔记本电脑

word_family.mean: n. 记录；笔记；便条；钞票；音；口气；口吻；气氛；音符；注释

sense_info_list.en: a short informal letter or written message

examination_example.sentence: Writing him thank-you <highlight>notes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给他写感谢信。

examination_example.sentence: Other choices, in descending order of personalization, are: a real-time phone call, a voice-mail message, a handwritten <highlight>note</highlight>, a typewritten letter, and the most unfriendly is email.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以个性化降序排列的其他选择包括：实时电话，语音邮件，手写便条，打字机信件，最不友好的是电子邮件。

examination_example.sentence: Some of these may change order according to the specific situation or your own preferences; for example, a handwritten <highlight>note</highlight> might seem more personal than voice-mail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些可能会根据特定情况或您自己的喜好更改顺序。 例如手写便条似乎比语音邮件更有个人风格。

sense_info_list.en: a short comment on or explanation of a word or passage in a book or article; an annotation

examination_example.sentence: Make a specific <highlight>note</highlight> on the company's system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对公司的制度做一个具体的说明。

examination_example.sentence: The local TV also <highlight>noted</highlight> that the cleanup spanned more than a mile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地电视台还指出，清理工作跨越了一英里多。

examination_example.sentence: And that, he <highlight>notes</highlight>, is a life worth living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他指出，这是一种值得过的生活。

sense_info_list.en: notice or pay particular attention to something

examination_example.sentence: Though employers are backed by a chorus of remote work advocates, others <highlight>note</highlight> the loneliness, reduced productivity and inefficiencies of extended remote work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管远程工作倡导者异口同声支持雇主们，但其他人注意到长时间远程工作带来了孤独感、生产率下降和效率低下等问题。

examination_example.sentence: But can you be sure you've <highlight>noted</highlight> every snack bar in your car, or every handful of nuts at your desk?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是你能确定你记下了车里的每一个小吃店，或者你办公桌上的每一把坚果吗？

examination_example.sentence: It's worth <highlight>noting</highlight> that the overall share of young adults living with their parents was not at a record high in 2014.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得一提的是，2014年和父母住在一起的年轻人总占比并非史上最高。

sense_info_list.en: a brief record of facts; topics; or thoughts; written down as an aid to memory

examination_example.sentence: I'll make a <highlight>note</highlight> here on the system for you, so that the payment will be made tomorrow morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会在系统上给你做个记录，以便明天早上付款。

examination_example.sentence: This is a huge drop and it is important to <highlight>note</highlight> that this was not merely a decline in reading paper books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个巨大的下降，值得注意的是，这不仅仅是纸质书阅读量的下降。

examination_example.sentence: The director general of the International Labor Organization <highlight>notes</highlight> that some countries have taken measures to address the effects of the global crisis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国际劳工组织总干事指出，一些国家已经采取措施应对全球危机的影响。

sample.mean: v. 意味着；有…的含意；暗示；意味着…的结果
v. 表示；指示；作为…名称
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
n. 概念；观念；看法；见解；一时的念头；突发的奇想；小件物品；感知
n. 恶名；声名狼藉；丑名；臭名昭著
adj. 声名狼藉的；臭名昭著的；众所周知的

word_usage.usage:
note作“笔记”时，其后须加s；作“书信”时,其后不加s。
示例：他做了听课笔记。
误 He made/took (a) note of the lecture.
正 He made/took notes of the lecture.
take notes of表示“记录”，而take note of表示“注意”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 集合名词，指全部来往信件。
最普通用词，泛指一切形式的书信，尤指邮寄的信。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条，正式或非正式均可。
指用心地去观察，了解某人或某物以达到某一目的。常用于命令句中。
语气比 notice 强，指不仅注意到，而且记录下来，侧重注意的认真与仔细。
指对所见所闻所感的人或事作出的反应，侧重结果。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 著名的；有名的
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
v. 知照；通知；告知；申报
adj. 值得注意的；显著的
n. 笔记本；笔记本电脑

word_family.mean: n. 记录；笔记；便条；钞票；音；口气；口吻；气氛；音符；注释

examination_example.sentence: Make a <highlight>note</highlight> of any page which is of special importance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把任何有特殊意义的一页记下来。

examination_example.sentence: In short, he loves postcards, and the excitement of getting a hand-written <highlight>note</highlight> from someone far away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简而言之，他喜欢明信片，以及收到远方某人手写的便条时的兴奋感。

examination_example.sentence: I'd then excuse myself to use the toilet, <highlight>note</highlight> down what the beggars said, and send the information to my teammates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我会找个借口去厕所，记下乞丐们说的话，然后把这些信息发给我的队友。

examination_example.sentence: As someone <highlight>noted</highlight> in this paper a couple of ago, they eat great food and never gain weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如几年前有人在这篇论文中提到的，他们吃很棒的食物，而且从不发胖。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers <highlight>noted</highlight> that the monkeys would go for the higher values more than half the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员指出，在超过一半的时间里，猴子会追求更高的值。

examination_example.sentence: To improve your <highlight>note-taking</highlight> skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提高你记笔记的技巧。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Note</highlight> also the facts important for your purpose as well as anything which leads you to further research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也要注意对你的目的重要的事实，以及任何能引导你进一步研究的东西。

examination_example.sentence: He's interested in the music, feeling every <highlight>note</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他对音乐很感兴趣，感觉着每一个音符。

examination_example.sentence: When she reached one nurse, she tried to press a five-pound <highlight>note</highlight> into her hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她找到一位护士时，她试图把一张五英镑的钞票塞进她的手里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 值得注意的；显著的
n. 笔记本；笔记本电脑

word_family.mean: n. 记录；笔记；便条；钞票；音；口气；口吻；气氛；音符；注释

sense_info_list.en: a brief record of facts, topics, or thoughts, written down as an aid to memory

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>notes</highlight> will help you understand and remember what you hear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些笔记将帮助你理解和记住你所听到的内容。

examination_example.sentence: These students are usually also very good at taking <highlight>notes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些学生通常也很擅长记笔记。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone took <highlight>notes</highlight> and shared their feeIings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都做了笔记，分享了自己的感受。

sense_info_list.en: a short informal letter or written message

examination_example.sentence: I saw a <highlight>note</highlight> lying on the desk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看见桌子上放着一张便条。

examination_example.sentence: If you don't want to see him, just write him a <highlight>note</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不想见他，就给他写张便条。

examination_example.sentence: What did Mr. Chan probably write to Amy in the <highlight>note</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 陈先生在纸条里会给艾米写什么呢?

sense_info_list.en: a short comment on or explanation of a word or passage in a book or article; an annotation

examination_example.sentence: Read Sally's and Jackie's <highlight>notes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读萨莉和杰基的评语。

examination_example.sentence: I have also written some <highlight>notes</highlight> under each of these photos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还在每张照片下面写了一些注释。

examination_example.sentence: Whom do all four kids mention in their <highlight>notes</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四个孩子在评语中都提到了谁?

sense_info_list.en: a single tone of definite pitch made by a musical instrument or the human voice

examination_example.sentence: Then play one <highlight>note</highlight> at a time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后一次弹奏一个音符。

examination_example.sentence: In the 20th century, the first four <highlight>notes</highlight> (音符) were used by other musicians to make different types of music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在20世纪，最初的四个音符被其他音乐家用来制作不同类型的音乐。

examination_example.sentence: They have to see musical <highlight>notes</highlight> and decode（解码）them in their brains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们必须看到音符并在大脑中解码。
